name: Sniper Slug Warrior: Metal Tank Assault
name_original: Sniper Slug Warrior: Metal Tank Assault
description:
Send your units to the battlefield and take over enemy bases with a simple tap of your finger!
Use the Tank Attack, along with other unique special attacks to turn the tide in battle, and the goddess of victory will smile upon you!!
Unforgettable battles against real opponents in equipped tanks.

Face your enemy Tanks in the battlefield and feel the combat power of your tank.

• Real-time Battle
• Realistic Physics
• opponents


It's real metal force!.....
